abstract: Using what is available on Herman Cain's Web site, the Economix blog estimates the effects of his 9-9-9 plan.
snippet: Using what is available on Herman Cain's Web site, the Economix blog estimates the effects of his 9-9-9 plan.
lead_paragraph: With recent polls showing increased support for Herman Cain as the G.O.P. presidential nominee, attention is being drawn to his platform, especially what he calls the 9-9-9 tax plan. Little detail has been released by the Cain campaign, so it's impossible to do a thorough analysis. But using what is available on Mr. Cain's Web site, Bruce Bartlett, who held senior policy roles in the Reagan and George H.W. Bush administrations, takes a stab at estimating its effects in the Economix blog. Read more »

headline.main: A Closer Look at Cain's 9-9-9 Plan
